items.title: Najib never set foot in bank, court told
items.summary: PUTRAJAYA: The High Court was urged to reconsider the charges against Datuk Seri Najib Razak as there was no evidence to show that the former prime minister had set foot at AmIslamic Bank Bhd in Jalan Raja Chulan, as alleged in the four charges of power abuse against him in the RM2.28bil 1Malaysia Development Bhd (1MDB). Read full story

items.title: Poland accuses Ukrainian of spying after drug arrest
items.summary: WARSAW (Reuters) -One of two Ukrainians detained for drug possession had shared photographs and coordinates of critical Polish army infrastructure with a Russian speaker, Polish prosecutors said on Wednesday. Read full story

items.title: Italy says any new EU measures on Russian assets must be lawful
items.summary: ROME (Reuters) -Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said on Wednesday that the European Union is discussing possible initiatives regarding the use of frozen Russian assets to help Ukraine, but any steps it takes must respect international law. Read full story

That low price is coming back around for a second-chance opportunity, giving you a $40 markdown that will arrive before Halloween, just in time to join your Spooktacular holiday display.

PlayStation Horizon Forbidden West Deluxe 6-inch Aloy Action Figure

Buy for $14.50 (Reg. $29.50)

What we love

As if ripped straight from Horizon Forbidden West, you can now bring home this 6-inch Aloy action figure to join your collectibles or simply add decoration to your gaming room/station setup. Not only does she have 42 points of articulation so you can pose to your preference, but you’ll also get 15 accessories to add on too, with six face plates, six hand sets, and of course her hunting essentials. On the same landing page, you can find other popular characters from across multiple Sony game franchises.

items.title: Whisker is now offering up to $150 discounts on its new and legacy Litter-Robot bundles starting from $776
items.summary:
This morning, Whisker launched its new lineup of three Litter-Robots alongside the PetTag and membership service, which is only getting better as the brand is taking up to $150 off bundles for those and predecessor models. Among the new lineup, things start with the Litter-Robot EVO Insights Bundle at $776 shipped, which gives you some nice bonus gear and features over the standard 3-year warranty bundle at its $699 full rate. This expanded bundle would normally run you $851, but you’re getting some solid launch savings here that cuts $75 off the tag and sets the bar for future discounts down the line. Alongside the extended 3-year warranty, you’ll also be getting a litter-trap mat, 25 disposable waste drawer liners, and a year of the new Whisker+ membership service for the most in-depth insights into your cat’s routines. Head below to learn more about this and the other bundles seeing discounts for a limited time.

more…
